Organization.name: Office français de l'immigration et de l'intégration (OFII)
Organization.description: French Office of Immigration and Integration responsible for professional, academic, and family immigration procedures as well as managing the national asylum seeker reception system.

Organization.name: Office français de protection des réfugiés et apatrides (OFPRA)
Organization.description: French Office for the Protection of Refugees and Stateless Persons responsible for examining and granting refugee status, stateless status, and subsidiary protection.

Organization.name: Direction Départementale de l'Emploi, du Travail et de la Formation Professionnelle
Organization.description: Departmental Directorate of Employment, Labour, and Professional Training responsible for assessing the employment situation in relation to work authorization requests.

Organization.name: Prefecture de Police de Paris
Organization.description: Prefecture in Paris responsible for registering asylum applications, providing temporary residence permits, and handling immigration procedures.

Organization.name: Cour Nationale du Droit d'Asile (CNDA)
Organization.description: National Court of Asylum Rights, a French administrative court that adjudicates appeals against decisions made by OFPRA regarding asylum applications.

Organization.name: Ministère de l'Intérieur
Organization.description: French Ministry of the Interior, overseeing immigration, integration, and public order, including supervision of OFII and OFPRA.

Organization.name: Guichet Unique pour Demandeurs d'Asile (GUDA)
Organization.description: Single window for asylum seekers, integrating services from the Prefecture and OFII for processing asylum applications in France.

Organization.name: Structure de Premier Accueil pour Demandeurs d'Asile (SPADA)
Organization.description: First Reception Structure for Asylum Seekers, providing initial support and guidance to individuals seeking asylum in France.

Organization.name: OFII Morocco
Organization.description: OFII office in Morocco responsible for assisting with immigration procedures, including family reunification and return aid.

Organization.name: OFII Tunisia
Organization.description: OFII office in Tunisia assisting with immigration and integration procedures, particularly for Tunisians moving to France.

Organization.name: OFII Turkey
Organization.description: OFII office in Turkey managing immigration processes, including family reunification, for Turkish nationals moving to France.

Organization.name: OFII Mali
Organization.description: OFII office in Mali providing services related to immigration and integration for Malian nationals moving to France.

Organization.name: OFII Senegal
Organization.description: OFII office in Senegal involved in managing immigration procedures, including return and reintegration assistance for Senegalese nationals.

Organization.name: OFII Cameroon
Organization.description: OFII office in Cameroon responsible for supporting Cameroonian nationals with immigration procedures to France.

Organization.name: OFII Armenia
Organization.description: OFII office in Armenia handling immigration processes, especially family reunification and integration for Armenians moving to France.

Organization.name: Asylum Seeker Support Program France
Organization.description: A French program managed by OFII providing housing, allowances, and administrative support to asylum seekers.

Organization.name: Centre Administratif d’Examen des Situations (CAES)
Organization.description: Administrative Center for Situation Examination providing asylum seekers with temporary accommodation and orientation.

Organization.name: Centre d'Accueil pour Demandeurs d'Asile (CADA)
Organization.description: Reception Center for Asylum Seekers providing housing and support services to individuals applying for asylum in France.

Organization.name: Programme d’Accueil et Hébergement des Demandeurs d'Asile (PRAHDA)
Organization.description: Reception and Housing Program for Asylum Seekers offering emergency accommodation to individuals seeking asylum.

Organization.name: Direction de la Police aux Frontières (DPAF)
Organization.description: Directorate of Border Police responsible for managing and securing France's borders, including immigration controls.

Organization.name: Commission Nationale de la Fraternité (CNF)
Organization.description: National Commission on Fraternity promoting integration and social cohesion in France.

Organization.name: Direction de l'Animation de la Recherche, des Études et des Statistiques (DARES)
Organization.description: Directorate for Research, Studies, and Statistics providing data and analysis on labor and social policies in France.

Organization.name: Protection Maternelle et Infantile (PMI)
Organization.description: Maternal and Child Protection service providing healthcare and social support to mothers and children in France.

Organization.name: Direction Départementale de la Cohésion Sociale (DDCS)
Organization.description: Departmental Directorate of Social Cohesion managing social integration and public welfare programs at the local level in France.

Organization.name: Agence Régionale de Santé (ARS)
Organization.description: Regional Health Agency overseeing public health initiatives and healthcare services in various French regions.

Organization.name: Office Central pour la Répression de la Traite des Êtres Humains (OCRTEH)
Organization.description: Central Office for the Repression of Trafficking in Human Beings, combating human trafficking and exploitation in France.

Organization.name: ADOMA
Organization.description: Public company providing housing solutions for disadvantaged populations, including asylum seekers and refugees, in France.

Organization.name: Agence Nationale de Lutte Contre l'Illettrisme (ANLCI)
Organization.description: National Agency for the Fight Against Illiteracy coordinating efforts to improve literacy among vulnerable populations in France.

Organization.name: Centres Gratuit d’Information, de Dépistage et de Diagnostic (CEGIDD)
Organization.description: Free Information, Testing, and Diagnostic Centers providing health services, including HIV testing, to the public in France.

Organization.name: Fichier National Automatisé des Empreintes Génétiques (FNAEG)
Organization.description: National Automated DNA Database used by law enforcement in France for identifying individuals involved in criminal activities.

Organization.name: Agence de Développement Rural et d’Environnement (ADDRE)
Organization.description: Agency for Rural Development and Environment focusing on sustainable development projects in rural areas of France.

Organization.name: Observatoire National Interministériel de la Sécurité Routière (ONISR)
Organization.description: National Interministerial Road Safety Observatory collecting and analyzing data to improve road safety in France.

Organization.name: Brigade de Répression de l'Activité Sexuelle (BRAS)
Organization.description: Brigade responsible for combating illegal sexual activities and trafficking in France.

Organization.name: Centres Académiques pour la Scolarisation des Nouveaux Arrivants et des enfants du Voyage (CASNAV)
Organization.description: Academic Centers for the Schooling of New Arrivals and Traveller Children supporting educational integration in France.

Organization.name: SAMU Social
Organization.description: Emergency social service providing assistance and shelter to homeless individuals and vulnerable populations in France.

Organization.name: Observatoire National de la Protection de l’Enfance (ONPE)
Organization.description: National Observatory for Child Protection monitoring and promoting the protection of children's rights in France.

Organization.name: France Terre d'Asile
Organization.description: Organization assisting with the reception and integration of refugees and asylum seekers in France.

Organization.name: Direction des Affaires Financières (DAF)
Organization.description: Directorate of Financial Affairs managing financial operations and budgeting for public services in France.

Organization.name: Direction Régionale Interdépartementale de l’Économie, de l'Emploi, du Travail et des Solidarités (DRIEETS)
Organization.description: Regional Directorate managing economic development, employment, labor, and social cohesion in several French regions.

Organization.name: Office National de l'Artisanat (ONA)
Organization.description: National Office of Craftsmanship promoting and supporting the development of the artisan sector in France.

Organization.name: Institut National de la Statistique (INS)
Organization.description: National Institute of Statistics responsible for collecting and analyzing statistical data across various sectors in France.

Organization.name: Direction de l’Information Légale et Administrative (DILA)
Organization.description: Directorate of Legal and Administrative Information providing official government publications and managing public records in France.

Organization.name: Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés (CNIL)
Organization.description: National Commission for Information Technology and Liberties overseeing data protection and privacy rights in France.

Organization.name: Direction de l'Administration Pénitentiaire (DAP)
Organization.description: Directorate of Prison Administration managing correctional facilities and overseeing the implementation of justice in France.

Organization.name: Institut de Recherche sur les Cancers (IRCAN)
Organization.description: Research Institute focused on cancer research and treatment innovation in France.

Organization.name: Office Central de Lutte contre la Criminalité (OCLC)
Organization.description: Central Office for Combating Crime coordinating national efforts to tackle organized crime in France.
